channel.title: How do I get my farmer100 runescape account back?
channel.description: I’m trying to get my runescape account back, it has a membership and he’s really good. I really need it back. Pls help me get it back, thx

item.title: How do I get my farmer100 runescape account back?
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

The rule states “No, I got hacked threads”, but under discussion with other staff, it will also account for losing any type of account threads. Locked.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I get my farmer100 runescape account back?

item.title: How do I get my farmer100 runescape account back?
item.dc:creator: @chenrily chenrily
item.description:
@chenrily wrote:

First, cancel the membership so you aren’t still paying for it. Then, if someone else hacked your password, try to do the recovery questions, if you set them, to recover your account and change the password. If you just forgot your password, click the “forgotten password” button and go through those steps. Good luck in getting your account back.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I get my farmer100 runescape account back?

item.title: How do I get my farmer100 runescape account back?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Don’t worry, I know the CEO of RuneScape personally and I’ll make him run an IP check and unban all accounts logged in from your IP. Got ya covered bro!
